channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 13:49 Air alarm to Chernihiv region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 13:49 Air alarm to Chernihiv region follow the following messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 13:48 Driven your alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further reports.
